TopicTitle: Best. Comic and Idea. Ever! Kcomikcatzz!

Articles.Content:
I'd like to share a cool site I found whilst browsing. It contains a lot of cats from memes and putting them in the position of average daily people. Such as Dave, the Business Cat. Kitkat, the little kitten sister of Dave, and Grumpy, their neighbor who never is happy and is always a grumpy cat (hint hint). I'm already signed up on it. I just want to discuss it here because noone has seen it much other than 300 other people, but only 3 of them (including me) have made an account on it. It would be nice (unlike grumpy) if you join, but it is also interesting.

kcomikcatzz.webs.com

(still a WIP, domain will change soon to be professional)

P.S. I won't spoil anything here, you've gotta see it for yourself.

The only thing I WILL spoil is that Kitkat is less of a business cat unlike Dave.

The acts are short, but still fun! The first act has just today finished. Act 2 is just getting started too!

DISCUSS

Ahem, discuss? o3o

I know some of you clicked it and read some of it...Now discuss?!
